channel.title: rust on Vivek's blog
channel.description: Recent content in rust on Vivek's blog

item.title: Rust: First Impressions
item.description: It was for a project during my undergrad that I grew interest for this strange programming language. It was suggested by none other than my team mate, and hardcore Rustacean Devdutt. Rust is different from the languages I’ve been used to, like Python and JavaScript. I have tried my hands at static typed low level languages like C and C++ and in my opinion, they are easy to get started with.
